sentence: She left a deep ______ on everyone at the meeting.
sentence_translation: 她在会议上给每个人留下了深刻的印象。

sentence: The rock ______ will perform at the stadium next weekend.
sentence_translation: 这个摇滚乐队下周末将在体育场表演。

sentence: We tried ______ fruits like durian and rambutan on the trip.
sentence_translation: 我们在旅途中尝试了榴莲、红毛丹等异国水果。

sentence: The ______ scenery of the waterfall attracted thousands of visitors.
sentence_translation: 瀑布那令人难以置信的景色吸引了成千上万的游客。

sentence: This song has become ______ on social media recently.
sentence_translation: 这首歌最近在社交媒体上很受欢迎。

sentence: You can ______ your car in the parking lot across the street.
sentence_translation: 你可以把车停在街对面的停车场。

sentence: It's ______ to marry at 18 in most countries.
sentence_translation: 在大多数国家，18岁结婚是合法的。

sentence: We found a quiet ______ by the lake to set up our tent.
sentence_translation: 我们在湖边找到一个安静的地点搭帐篷。

sentence: The opening ______ of the sports meeting will be held tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 运动会的开幕式将于明天举行。

sentence: I bought two tickets for the piano ______ next Friday.
sentence_translation: 我买了两张下周五钢琴音乐会的票。

sentence: We eat ______ food like dumplings during the Spring Festival.
sentence_translation: 春节期间我们吃饺子等传统食物。

sentence: The ______ received a warm welcome from the audience.
sentence_translation: 这位表演者受到了观众的热烈欢迎。

sentence: ______ is a time when people take on more responsibilities.
sentence_translation: 成年时期是人们承担更多责任的阶段。

sentence: It's a ______ that you missed such a wonderful show.
sentence_translation: 你错过了这么精彩的演出，真是遗憾。

sentence: From the top of the mountain, we enjoyed a beautiful ______ of the valley.
sentence_translation: 在山顶，我们欣赏到了山谷的美丽景色。

sentence: Traveling to different countries is a valuable ______ for children.
sentence_translation: 去不同的国家旅行对孩子们来说是宝贵的经历。

sentence: I can't ______ what I did on my 10th birthday.
sentence_translation: 我想不起自己10岁生日那天做了什么。

sentence: The actors wore colorful ______ in the traditional play.
sentence_translation: 演员们在这部传统戏剧中穿着色彩鲜艳的戏服。

sentence: Childhood ______ always make me feel warm.
sentence_translation: 童年回忆总让我感到温暖。

sentence: She enjoys the ______ of her pet dog when she's alone at home.
sentence_translation: 独自在家时，她喜欢宠物狗的陪伴。

sentence: He is an ______ traveler who likes to explore unknown places.
sentence_translation: 他是个爱冒险的旅行者，喜欢探索未知的地方。

sentence: Her ______ were hurt by his rude words.
sentence_translation: 他粗鲁的话语伤害了她的情感。

sentence: We watched the National Day ______ on TV with our family.
sentence_translation: 我们和家人一起在电视上看了国庆阅兵。

sentence: They are discussing their ______ ______ for the summer holiday.
sentence_translation: 他们正在讨论暑假的旅行计划。

sentence: We took many photos of beautiful scenery ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 我们沿途拍了很多美丽景色的照片。

sentence: There will be a wonderful ______ ______ on New Year's Eve.
sentence_translation: 除夕将有一场精彩的烟花表演。

sentence: She ______ ______ ______ getting up early for work.
sentence_translation: 她习惯于早起上班。

sentence: The hotel room has good ______ ______ to keep cool in summer.
sentence_translation: 酒店房间的空调很好，夏天能保持凉爽。

sentence: My little brother ______ ______ ______ ______ and loves cakes.
sentence_translation: 我弟弟爱吃甜食，喜欢蛋糕。

sentence: The success of the project ______ ______ everyone's hard work.
sentence_translation: 这个项目的成功取决于每个人的努力。

sentence: He ______ ______ while listening to the teacher's explanation.
sentence_translation: 听老师讲解时，他点头附和。

sentence: We ______ ______ ______ meeting you again soon.
sentence_translation: 我们期待很快再次见到你。

sentence: After a long discussion, they finally ______ ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 经过长时间的讨论，他们最终达成共识。

sentence: The city is famous for its historical ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 这座城市以其历史旅游景点而闻名。

sentence: You must carry your ______ when traveling to another country.
sentence_translation: 去其他国家旅行时，你必须携带护照。

sentence: A short walk in the park can ______ your mind after work.
sentence_translation: 下班后在公园散会儿步能让你恢复精力。

sentence: He needs to ______ his library card before it expires next month.
sentence_translation: 他需要在下个月图书馆借书证到期前续期。
